name: Tide-Hardened
summary: You're at home in the unpredictable tides.
description:
You're at home in the unpredictable tides. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against cold and water effects. If you roll a success on a save against a cold or water effect, you get a critical success instead.Traits

Undine: Undines are planar scions descended from marids.
